mods.abstract: Image (in portrait orientation) of a young boy looking at a poster that reads" Help us to Help! Benefit Performance at Cooperative Theatres Tue. Dec. 23 Proceeds for the Unemployed" reverse caption reads:"This poster is being displayed in 46 co-operative theatres in Toronto, who are donating the proceeds of the performances on Tuesday evening December 23rd, for the unemployed. The following theatres are participating: Aster, Avalon, Bluebell, Bonita, Brighton, Broadview, Chateau, Carlton, College Playhouse, Classic, Crescent Palace, Crystal, Cum-Bae, Doric, Duchess, Dundas Playhouse, Eclipse, Family, Garden, Hudson, Iola, Kenwood, King, Kingswood, Kitchener, King's Playhouse, Kum-C, La Reta, Liberty, Lyndhurst, Madison, Mayfair, Model, National, Odeon, Orpheum, Oxford, Paulton, Park, Peter Pan, Prince Edward, Queen's Royal, Revue, Rex, Rialto, Temple" (image has been marked up by Photo Editor).
mods.accessCondition: Photograph now in public domain. For citation information or to obtain high resolution image, contact ascproj@yorku.ca or see Toronto Telegram FAQ.
